  enumPropNamesArray: ["kind", "tooltipPosition"],
  iconPropNamesArray: ["leftIcon", "rightIcon"]
});

<Meta
  title="Navigation/Menu/MenuItemButton"

export const menuItemButtonTemplate = createComponentTemplate(MenuItemButton);
